title: Carrot Consumption and Weight
question_text: A researcher thinks there may be a negative correlation between the number of carrots an individual consumes and that individualâ€™s weight. The researcher surveys $250$ randomly selected females and asks each her weight and how many servings of carrots she consumes per month. The researcher also surveys $250$ randomly selected males and asks them the same questions. A scatterplot is made with different symbols for male and female data. The study done by this researcher is:

choices.text: An experiment with a block design, blocking on gender.
A matched pairs experiment where a male could be paired with a female of similar weight.
